title: [GRAPHICS] Safecracker Evelynn doesn't have a specular map anymore
body:
I can't see any specular map in her bodysuit as it used to have before, was it removed or is it a bug?

https://img.overpic.net/images/p/k/7/xpk73mepw9eyz74wlyyv.jpg

I think it used to look much better with the shiny effect, I hope it wasn't removed.
